text: "Risk" is a song recorded by American singer-songwriter Gracie Abrams for her second studio album, The Secret of Us (2024). It was released on May 1, 2024, through Interscope Records. It is the lead single from the album. "Risk" peaked at number 94 on the US Billboard Hot 100. Abrams performed "Risk" on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon and The Today Show. She also performed it on The Secret of Us Tour (2024â€“2025) and Taylor Swift The Eras Tour (2024). ==References== Category:2024 songs Category:Gracie Abrams songs
title: Risk (song)
